channel.title: Auto Cache Downloader
channel.description: I just found out that the problem in my auto cache downloader is my LINK. and i have uploaded my cache on dropbox. yet i heard that there is some special things i gotta do for example i heard that i have to Zip my files INSIDE the cache i have done this and it didnt work. lately i heard that the Font size should be 32 :O is it true and conserning about the Zip the files inside the cache is it EVERYTHING INSIDE THE CACHE or what hope some1 can help me out with this.

item.title: Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

II john II:

Not ur whole cache. ZIP all the files inside the cache.

okay so do this:

  1. Zip the files INSIDE the cache (which will make a folder with a .ZIP inside of it.)
  2. Upload The FOLDER on DropBox
  3. When it’s done move the cache to Public folder in dropbox.
  4. right click the .Zip folder inside the public folder and press " Copy Public Link "
  5. when a small window shows up press " Copy To Clipboard " and it will copy the DIRECT LINK of the .Zip file
  6. paste this link in cachedownloader.java and it should work

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

lol i do but i currently cant go on tmv. im gonna tell u again what to do.

  1. Zip the files INSIDE the cache
  2. Upload The .Zip file on DropBox
  3. When it’s done move the cache to Public folder in dropbox.
  4. right click the .Zip folder inside the public folder and press " Copy Public Link "
  5. when a small window shows up press " Copy To Clipboard " and it will copy the DIRECT LINK of the .Zip file
  6. paste this link in cachedownloader.java and it should work

item.title: Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @badboyzack10 badboyzack10
item.description:
@badboyzack10 wrote:

right …go inside cache so you see all the files n that

make a zip folder and name it “your server name”

the go to signlink.java find “findcachedir()” under that should be something like return ./cachename
change that to “your server name” the cache

then go to client.java and find the same thing …the old cache and replace with yourname

hope i helped

Read full topic
